snippet.title: On the Peril of Parrots - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Take control of P.O.L.L.I (Procedural Operating Layered Linguistic Intelligence).
Complete over 100 challenges to certify your reasoning and problem solving ability. Prove to the Doctor, that you are a SUCCESS, and not a FAILURE.

To complete each puzzle you must convert all the available spaces to one color. Each challenge will reward you with crackers. Collect enough crackers to complete the experiment and make the Doctor proud.

Manage bias to lower the amount of crackers necessary. Expand your training dataset to gain access to more challenges.

Key Features
👀100+ Challenging Puzzles
👀unlimited Undos
👀a Mysterious story with multiple endings

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Wishlist Today:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2137480/On_the_Peril_of_Parrots/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB
